Config.Name: OpenAI API - Base URL
Config.Description: Base URL for the OpenAI-compatible API. If using LocalAI on the same machine, set to http://IP_ADDRESS:8080

Config.Name: OpenAI API - Key
Config.Description: API key for the OpenAI-compatible API.

Config.Name: Internal Collections Database Path
Config.Description: Internal path to the collections database. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: Internal Assets Path
Config.Description: Internal path to the assets directory. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: Database Path
Config.Description: Path to the database directory for LocalRecall

Config.Name: Assets Path
Config.Description: Path to the assets directory for LocalRecall

Config.Name: Vector Engine
Config.Description: Vector database engine to use. Currently only 'postgres' is supported.

Config.Name: Hybrid Search - BM25 Weight
Config.Description: Weight for BM25 in hybrid search (0.0 to 1.0).

Config.Name: Hybrid Search - Vector Weight
Config.Description: Weight for vector search in hybrid search (0.0 to 1.0).
